Garothi Worldbreaker

Positioning / Things to Know

  • When you are targeted by Fel Bombardment move out to the side and run from the impact points
  • Run out for Eradication (happens right after the intermission)
  • Soak small circles if they are in melee range
  • Run out of big circles if they are in melee range

Tank Damage Profile

70% Physical (65% auto attacks, 5% special)
30% Fire

Fel Bombardment is fire damage

Eradication is physical damage

Tanking Notes

  • The tank swap on this fight is the bombardment
  • There must always be a tank in melee range esle the boss will pulse out AoE damage on the raid (the only exception to this is when eradication is cast or when you have bombardment)
  • As the majority of damage taken on this encounter is via auto attacks, this means that it can be blocked / parried / dodged

Tank Assignments

  • Your job on this fight is purely to have a tank in melee range at all times (except for eradication or when you have bombardmnet)
  • Swap on each bombardment cast and ensure you have some form of mitigation up for the first swing after the hit (to avoid spikes)

Additional Notes

  • The hits from the boss do not consume bone shield charges (confirmed not to be a bug)
  • You can torpedo away from the boss when bombardment timer is ~1 and be safe from all hits for extra DPS time
